attributes.action: Funding for Research into Fibrous Dysplasia (FD) & McCune Albright Syndrome (MAS)
attributes.additional_details:
Funding for Research into Fibrous Dysplasia (FD) & McCune Albright Syndrome (MAS).

This condition / disorder is so rare that there are an estimated 1/100,000 living with this horrible condition. There are only a few selected specialists that know a little about this however they do not always know enough to be able to give right diagnoses or treatment or after care.
